aboutme: I am a Full Stack Developer with a degree from the University of Turin, currently residing in France. As a passionate advocate for the open-source community, I dedicate myself to developing projects that are freely accessible to everyone. My expertise spans across various domains, but I have a particular passion for mobile development. Right now, I'm working on an exciting project called CineMit, an app designed to bring people together for group movie outings at theaters. I thrive on creating innovative solutions and contributing to projects that make a positive impact on people's lives.
